title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new My New Post More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

$ git clone https://github.com/xaoxuu/hexo-theme-stellar.git themesstellar$ npm install hexo-renderer-pug –save$ npm install hexo-renderer-sass –save hexo cleanhexo generatehexo server git config –global user.name “wcl0755bigdata”git config –global user.email ““ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C ““ssh-add d:\doc\id_rsaeval “$(ssh-agent -s)” ssh-add d:docid_rsa $ clip ~.sshid_rsa.pub Copies the contents of the id_rsa.pub file to your clipboardhttp || https 代理git config –global http.proxy 127.0.0.1:7890git config –global https.proxy 127.0.0.1:7890 sock5代理git config –global http.proxy socks5 127.0.0.1:7891git config –global https.proxy socks5 127.0.0.1:7891
